and.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS WHERE CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'PRIMARY KEY' and TABLE_NAME = 'T_PAYMENTOPERATION'
SELECT count(*) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS WHERE table_schema='${defaultSchemaName}' and CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'PRIMARY KEY' and TABLE_NAME = lower('T_PAYMENTOPERATION')
SELECT count(*) FROM sys.user_constraints where CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'P' and TABLE_NAME = 'T_PAYMENTOPERATION'
SELECT count(*) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.INDEXES WHERE TABLE_NAME='T_PAYMENTOPERATION' AND INDEX_NAME='I_PAYMENTOPERATION_DOCID'
SELECT count(*) from pg_indexes where schemaname='${defaultSchemaName}' and tablename=lower('T_PAYMENTOPERATION') and indexname=lower('I_PAYMENTOPERATION_DOCID')
SELECT count(*) from user_indexes where table_name=upper('T_PAYMENTOPERATION') and index_name=upper('I_PAYMENTOPERATION_DOCID')
SELECT count(*) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.INDEXES WHERE TABLE_NAME='T_PAYMENTOPERATION' AND INDEX_NAME='I_PAYMENTOPERATION_TYPE'
SELECT count(*) from pg_indexes where schemaname='${defaultSchemaName}' and tablename=lower('T_PAYMENTOPERATION') and indexname=lower('I_PAYMENTOPERATION_TYPE')
SELECT count(*) from user_indexes where table_name=upper('T_PAYMENTOPERATION') and index_name=upper('I_PAYMENTOPERATION_TYPE')
